tool_description: Analyzes scheduling conflicts and generates resolution strategies including rescheduling, reassignment, and resource reallocation options.

conflicts.description: List of scheduling conflicts to resolve

resolution_strategy.description: Preferred resolution approach: reschedule, reassign, split_work, add_resource

priority_override.description: Allow high-priority work orders to override lower priority assignments

max_delay_hours.description: Maximum acceptable delay for rescheduling in hours

error_messages: Invalid conflict data: Conflict descriptions are malformed or incomplete
No resolution possible: Conflicts cannot be resolved with available resources and constraints
Invalid strategy: Use one of [reschedule, reassign, split_work, add_resource]
Delay exceeds limit: Proposed resolutions exceed max_delay_hours constraint
usage: Provide conflict details and preferred resolution strategy. The tool generates actionable solutions prioritized by feasibility and business impact.

resolved_assignments.description: Updated assignment proposals after conflict resolution

impact_assessment.description: Assessment of resolution impact on schedules and SLAs

alternative_solutions.description: Alternative resolution options if primary plan fails
